import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext"; const BottomNav = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const location = useLocation(); // Don't render if user is not logged in if (!user) return null; const isActive = (path) => { // Consider root path as feed if ( path === "/feed" && (location.pathname === "/" || location.pathname === "/feed") ) return true; // For profile paths, check if we're on a profile page and it's the user's profile if (path.includes("/profile/") && location.pathname.includes("/profile/")) { return location.pathname === path; } // For other paths, exact match or starts with return ( location.pathname === path || (path !== "/feed" && location.pathname.startsWith(path)) ); }; return (
{isActive("/feed") ? ( ) : ( )} {isActive("/explore") ? ( ) : ( )} {isActive("/create-post") ? ( ) : ( )} {isActive("/messages") ? ( ) : ( )} {isActive(`/profile/${user?.username}`) ? (
{user.displayName?.[0] || user.username?.[0]}
) : (
{user.displayName?.[0] || user.username?.[0]}
)}
); }; export default BottomNav;
